price: ‘আৰু নিশ্চয় তুমি তাত তৃষ্ণাতুৰো নহ’বা, ৰ’দতো আক্ৰান্ত নহ’বা’।
arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍḥā
